questions.question: You are invited to a friend's birthday. You respond thanking him/her. Suggest some different ways that you can help him/her.

answers.answer: First, thank you for the invatation. I hope that night will be great.
I have my mother's car so if want some help for the organisation (the delivery for example). I can come with some drink if you want, i make awesome ponches and coktails.
May I sleep in your garden that night ? I think I could'nt take the car after driking my awesome ponche.
Don't forget we have big english test this week !
